caller_intent: Tim Hooker wants to add a new truck to his insurance policy effective immediately so he can drive it home before selling his current vehicle. He also seeks clarification on driving without a license plate once insured.
resolution_steps: Holly confirms Tim's identity and policy details (name, address, existing policy).
Tim provides VIN and clarifies the truck is a diesel (correcting a title error).
Holly verifies coverage preferences (liability + comprehensive) and deductible ($100).
Holly explains processing timeline (quote sent within 24 hours) and confirms insurance coverage for driving the truck home.
Holly advises against legal advice on driving without a tag but confirms insurance coverage.
knowledge_required: Vehicle addition process to insurance policies
Temporary insurance coverage for new vehicles
systems_referenced: Policy management system (to pull existing policy details)
summary: Tim Hooker added a new truck to his policy with Alliance Insurance, specifying coverage needs and effective date. Holly confirmed details, processed the request, and clarified temporary coverage for driving the truck home. A quote will be sent within 24 hours.
